name: Game Server Finder
body:
# Discription

Find all multiplayer games being played inside campus with a nice browser based interface

***
# Dependencies

* Requires [Python2.7](http://www.python.org/)
* Requires lateset version of [Twisted module for python](http://twistedmatrix.com)
* Requires a HTTP web server or simply a browser if you want to use it only for yourself

***

# How To Use

#### To start the Application

* Make sure twisted library for python is installed

    * `sudo easy_install twisted`

* Move the code to a folder inside the webserver root directory
* Start main.py in workers folder

    * `$> cd workers`

    * `$> python main.py`

* Start the webserver

***

# Bugs

In case of any problem or suggestions drop me a mail at : argetlam.akshet [at] gmail [dot] com

If you would like to contribute, do check out the TODO for a list of tasks that need to be done,
also if you find any bugs please report them at the [Issues Page](https://github.com/akshetpandey/GameServerFinder/issues)

If you can submit a patch for the bugs that would be awesome :)

***

Hope you find it useful and do report the bugs

Akshet Pandey
tagline: A Program To Locate All Multiplayer Games Being Played Inside Campus
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
